The Civic Tech Candidate, Kalen Gallagher 👨‍💼

Jul 20, 2018

  • civictech
  • episode
  • government
  • local government

We engage in a conversation with Kalen Gallagher, School Board Member, and candidate for the San Jose City Council. We talk policy, civic tech, inclusion, and what it’s like to be a candidate for office.
